definitions.title: n.[m.] pl.
definitions.body: youth, early life;—abs. ´[[נ]] Is 54:6, Ps 127:4; elsewhere sf. [[נְעֻרַי]] 1Sa 12:2, [[נְעוּרַי]] Job 31:18 +, [[נְעֻרֶיְ]] 2Sa 19:8, [[נְעוּרֶיְ]] Pr 5:18 +, [[נְעוּרַיִח]] Je 2:2 +, [[נְעוּרָָיְכִי]] Ps 103:5, [[נְעוּרֵיהֶן]] Ez Eze 23:3, etc.;—youth, early life, esp. in phr. ´[[מִנּ]] from one's youth up Ge 8:21 (J), 1Sa 17:33, 1Ki 18:12, Je 3:24, Zec 13:5, Job 31:18 (extreme youth; ‖[[מִבֶּטֶן אִמִּי]]); fig. of Babylon Is 47:12, Is 47:15, Moab Je 48:11, Judah Je 22:21 cf. Ps 71:5, Ps 71:17, Ps 129:1, Ps 129:2; [[וְעַד־עַתָּה]] ´[[מִנּ]] Ge 46:34 (J), 2Sa 19:8, Ez Eze 4:14; [[וְעַד־הַיּוֹם הַזֶּה]] ´[[מִנּ]] 1Sa 12:2, Je 3:25; as time in or during which Le 22:13 (H), Nu 30:4, Nu 30:16 (P), La 3:27, Ps 144:12, fig. of Judah and Sam., personif., Ez Eze 23:2, Eze 23:8; cf. ´[[יְמֵי נ]] (in fig. of Isr.) Ho 2:17 (‖[[יוֹם עֲלוֹתָהּ מֵאֶרֶץ מִחְרָָיִם]]), Ez Eze 16:22, Eze 16:43, Eze 16:60, Eze 23:19; other phr. are: ´[[אַלּוּף נ]] Je 3:4 friend of my youth, cf. Pr 2:17, ´[[עֲוֹנוֹת נ]] Job 13:26, ´[[חַטּאׁות נ]] Ps 25:7, ´[[חֶסֶד נ]] Je 2:2, ´[[חֶרְפַּת נ]] Je 31:19, ´[[זִמַּת נ]] Ez Eze 23:21, ´[[שְׁדֵי נ]] v:Eze 23:21, ´[[בַּעַל נ]] Joe 1:8, and esp. ´[[אֵשֶׁת נ]] Pr 5:18, Mal 2:14, Mal 2:15, Is 54:6 (fig.); ´[[בְּנֵי נ]] Ps 127:4 sons of (a man's) youth; = youthful vigour Ps 103:5.
